title: Dog Days – Wonder Novels
Summary:
Wu Zhe comes back with another warm and heartfelt story:
Jiang Kuo [江阔] is the son of a wealthy real estate businessman. Against his family’s wishes, he hatches a plan to run away from home in a flashy green sports car to start his first year at a second-rate university. He’s always been a bit of a loner—not that he minded—but at school, he meets Duan Feifan [段非凡], who with his impressive set of social skills manages to break down Jiang Kuo’s barriers. But can Duan Feifan overcome the inhibitions in his own heart? And will they, together, find a path forward into the rest of their lives?
